about_the_game:
You wake up in a spaceship. Your memory is blurred and you immediately sense that something is wrong. Strange noises echo through the corridors and strange shadows move along the walls. You quickly realize that you are not alone and that something dangerous is on board. Your top priority is to get back to civilization. But this is easier said than done. The eerie encounters you make on your journey gnaw at your mind and make you doubt your own perception.

  • Continuous storyline


As you try to unlock the secrets of the universe, you will gradually discover the truth about yourself and your role in the universe. Why are you here? What made you so special that you ended up in this situation? The answers lie hidden somewhere inside this mysterious ship and the universe.



  • hub world

Your journey always leads you back to a central hub world. This not only serves as a hub to get to the next chapter of your story, but also offers a variety of entertaining mini-games. These mini-games are not only a welcome change of pace, but also offer the opportunity to earn unique rewards. Can you become the best and break all records?



  • Hard Puzzles

The path back to civilization is peppered with challenges. You will come across numerous tricky puzzles that will put your logical thinking and powers of observation to the test. Collect helpful items, combine them cleverly and find creative solutions to make progress. Every puzzle you solve brings you closer to the truth.

  • help system


If you get stuck, you can activate the help system. This system highlights important story components and hints in neon blue and helps you to find the next step. But be warned: this function is only available on the “Easy” and “Normal” difficulty levels. In the higher difficulty levels, you are completely on your own.

Immerse yourself in this exciting adventure, solve the mystery of your existence and find out what role you play in the grand scheme of the universe. Prepare yourself for the fact that nothing is as it seems and that every decision you make has consequences. Your destiny is in your hands.
